name: Product Like and Hide
author: Product Like and Hide

sections.description:
The Product Like and Hide is an WooCommerce add-on that allows customers to like or hide products on your store. Customers can easily “like” a product by clicking the like button on the product page.

This feature can be used to create a wishlist, or to simply show which products are the most popular among customers.

Additionally, Product Like and Hide also allows customers to hide products that they are not interested in, which can help to declutter the browsing experience.

Product Like and Hide helps customers find the products they love faster, and improve their overall browsing experience on your website.

Important: This plugin is an extension of the WooCommerce plugin and it cannot function independently.

Check out the Plugin Homepage for documentation and the changelog.

Main Features

✅ Allow customers to like products.
✅ Allow customers to hide products.
✅ Display the number of likes on the product page.
✅ A Shortcode that displays the user’s liked products in a page.
✅ Display a login or register message to not logged-in users that try to like a product.
✅ Daily, Weekly, Monthly and Yearly admin statistics of most liked and hidden products.

Shortcodes

plah_user_likes_page – Displays the current user’s liked products

Filters and Actions

Multiple hooks will allow you to customize the plugin even further.

Like this plugin? Please consider leaving a 5-star review.

Do you have any questions: Contact us.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the “Product Like and Hide” plugin into the directory wp-content/plugins/.
  2. Enable the “Product Like and Hide” plugin.
sections.faq:
Can I translate the Product Like and Hide?

You can translate Product Like and Hide into any language.

I am facing a problem using this plugin. What can I do?

Post detailed information about the issue in the support forum
